title: How the hell does this grade system works?
body:
http://i.imgur.com/7wFMhHa.jpg

In what world does a 1/3/21 gets a B? I know it's based on average champion performance on server etc. etc. but c'mon, i've already did worse than that and got a better grade.

Funny thing is that the Caitlyn was having internet issues and was on and off and on and off again during the first 30 mins of the game. She finished the game 4/3/7 and 90 farm at 45 minutes and gets a S-. I mean, wtf?

Match History and the game at replay.gg:
http://matchhistory.br.leagueoflegends.com/pt/#match-details/BR1/842680788/673499?tab=builds&participant=7
http://www.replay.gg/search/br/TAMAirlines#842680788

replies.body:
The grading system isnt prefect, neither is match making, mmr , or elo. its all created by Riot and for the most part they can tweak and adjust what they think makes the most impact regarding those systems. it sucks. im with you , im a support player myself and i had a game where i was 2-6-26 as morg and only got an A. I had the best kda on team, i warded more then any one else. I only got an A. My jungler  (21-6-9) who i made into a god and let them carry got an S+ and my adc who had an ok game (7-9-13) got an S-. I have a lvl 6 mastery on {{champion:25}} with a S+ for 1 lvl 7 mastery token. I guess i suck? maybe i have to go like 2-0-26? maybe my 6 deaths was considered feeding? I dont fukin know. 

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

dont question the great and pwerful RITO
just accept the rating you get and move on.

You're not in the top X% of Janna performances for summoner's rift is what it amounts to.  

Nobody truly knows exactly how things are measured.  Riot dishes these out on a need to know basis.  And we don't need to know.
Well u placed 37 wards in 44 mins. Average support places 1 per minute. You bought only 1 pink ward. Your gold generation was low, meaning u didnt utilize your gold income item properly,

> Well u placed 37 wards in 44 mins. Average support places 1 per minute

I couldn't ward early game, I couldn't leave the lane. The jungler wasn't even trying to gank me, and I hold the tower for quite a while. The system doesn't know that tho. Anyway, as I said, I've had worse games than that and got better grades.
This game, for example:
http://matchhistory.br.leagueoflegends.com/pt/#match-details/BR1/841072782/673499?tab=overview
34 wards at 51. Got a S.

> You bought only 1 pink ward. 

That's my bad. Doesn't justify a B tho.

> Your gold generation was low, meaning u didnt utilize your gold income item properly

As I said, I was solo at the lane. Trying to farm under tower, and even if a wasn't, how am I supposed to auto attack the enemy in a 2x1 lane?
